comment: The wave indicates the first year of the respective GHS data-collection that typically extended into the subsequent calendar year.
Code is available to combine crops into simpler categories but not used to generate the current dataset
Only one agricultural season is tracked in Nigeria

varLabel_source: Area of Plot Measured with GPS; What is the area of this plot (%rostertitle%)? ENUMERATOR: MEASURE THE ARE

comment: Generated from farmer-reported area planted for tree/permanet crops, including cassava (see s11fq4a/sa3iq5a) when proportion of area planted was not available. Note that the sum of reported area planted for multiple crops sometimes is greater than the plot area; code is available to rescale to plot area

varLabel_source: When did you plant the seeds for [CROP] on [PLOT]? (YEAR)
When was most of the [CROP] seeds palnted on [PLOT] this agricultural season?
When did household start the harvest of [CROP] from [PLOT]? (YEAR)
When did household start the harvest of [CROP] from [PLOT]? (MONTH)
When did your household complete harvest of [CROP] from [PLOT]? (YEAR)
When did your household complete harvest of [CROP] from [PLOT]? (MONTH)
